name: Luxembourg
scope_notes: Prototype compliance mapping only. Always validate structure and distribution with Luxembourg counsel and CSSF guidance.
marketing_notes: Distribution requirements depend on vehicle type and target investors.
Do not treat summaries as approvals; confirm with counsel.
licensing_notes: AIFM/ManCo and delegation substance requirements are fact-dependent.
tokenization_notes: Tokenized interests require separate analysis for securities/transfer restrictions.
crypto_financing_notes: Crypto exposure/custody may trigger additional controls and disclosures.
risk_flags: Retail access or semi-professional investor nuances
